name: Avoid Programs with High Fan-In  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs with High Fan-In.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Programs with High Fan-In.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: The higher the number of reference to a Program, the more difficult the maintenance as all referencing. Artifacts will have to be updated or tested.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of references to the program
